transcript.title: Mike Rann
transcript.content:
I would like to thank Mike Rann for his service to the people of South Australia and Australia as Premier.

Mike has led Labor in South Australia for 17 years - almost 10 of them as Premier.

Since 1993, Mike has been a great Labor leader, bringing social inclusion onto the national agenda, sealing negotiations for the expansion of Olympic Dam and providing leadership on tackling climate change.

Mike's legacy will be a stronger, fairer and more sustainable South Australia.

No-one thought South Australia would find a Premier to fill Don Dunstan's shoes, but in Mike we did.

On behalf of all my Federal ALP colleagues, I wish Mike the best of luck.

I also welcome and congratulate the next Premier of South Australia, Jay Weatherill.

Jay and I worked closely together in our former roles as education ministers, and I know that Jay will deliver the energy and leadership that will serve South Australia well into the future.
